Gently fold 0.7 cl of Scotch into the mixture until fully blended.

Relax and let the flavors speak for themselves.

Name: Yone
Preparation: Sprinkle 3.8 ml of Carbonated water lightly for a touch of flair.

Stir 3.4 ml of Champagne with precision for 17 seconds.

Let the aroma fill the room for 11 seconds before tasting.

Stir 1.1 ml of Applejack with a bar spoon in a circular motion.
